title: elo vs actual rank
body: i feel like smurfing isnt really productive to people who are actively trying to get better. it really makes games not fun at all. just had a smurf on my team go 11-0 completly carry the game and he said hes on a 20 game win streak. why isnt league IP sensitive so if you create another account to play in silver when you are a D1 player it should match you with people your own skill level. not let you stomp on people game after game. what do you guys think?

replies.body: Hmmmm yea I can understand some of the frustration around smurfing when people end up playing in ranks they clearly don't belong in. In the long run, those players will end up moving into the ranks they should be in.
